title: Divisional Round Preview And Picks, Bill Cowher Interview (Football 01/12)
description:
Will Brinson, Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco, and Jason La Canfora link up to preview and pick the divisional round slate. Will, Nick, Pete, and Jason give their against the spread selections on Eagles-Falcons, Pats-Titans, Jags-Steelers, and Saints-Vikings. Then, NFL on CBS Analyst and former Steelers head coach Bill Cowher joins Will Brinson and the Pick Six podcast to discuss the AFC playoffs, reacting to last week's Jacksonville-Buffalo matchup and explaining his epic and viral jump through a table a la Bills Mafia. Then, Coach breaks down the upcoming matchups between the Steelers and Jags, and Patriots and Titans. Lastly, as someone always in rumors to return from broadcasting to the sidelines, Cowher assesses how he think Jon Gruden will fare in his move to the Raiders.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
